loginAdminFunction

public static int loginAdminFunction()
function to login admin

Returns:
if the user attempts to login as an admin 3 times unsuccessfully escape is returned which exits the program otherwise 1 is returned which indicates a success, or 3 which indicates an unsuccessful attempt

loginUserFunction

public static int loginUserFunction()
function to login user

Returns:
if the user attempts to login as an admin 3 times unsuccessfully escape is returned which exits the program otherwise 1 is returned which indicates a success, or 3 which indicates an unsuccessful attempt

addFilmFunction

public static boolean addFilmFunction()
function to add a film

Returns:
returns true if the film was added successfully

advancedBooking

public static boolean advancedBooking()
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Returns:
returns false if the customer is under-age, the number of seats requested exceeds the maximum number of allowed seats or if the entered number of seats is 0 or if the entered showing ID is not found
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - is thrown because the BufferedReader object requires to be surrounded by a try/catch block and having the method throw it reduced complexity

makeBooking

public static boolean makeBooking()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Exactly the same function as advanced booking, except the details of the customer are not collected

Returns:
returns false if the customer is under-age, the number of seats requested exceeds the maximum number of allowed seats or if the entered number of seats is 0 or if the entered showing ID is not found
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - is thrown because the BufferedReader object requires to be surrounded by a try/catch block and having the method throw it reduced complexity
